H0.text: Which state in North America has the oldest known currently living tree, age confirmed, in the world. US-CO

H1.text: Which state in North America has the oldest known currently living tree, age confirmed, in the world. US-UT

H2.text: Which state in North America has the oldest known currently living tree, age confirmed, in the world. US-NV

H3.text: Which state in North America has the oldest known currently living tree, age confirmed, in the world. US-CA

A4.text: The Methuselah (pine tree) is the second oldest known living tree and is located in the White Mountains of California.

A5.text: The Methuselah (sequoia tree) is the 27th largest tree in the world and is located in Sequoia National Forest, California.
